title: Dollarama reports 2% rise in quarterly profit - Nasdaq.com
text: Sept 12 (Reuters) - Canadian discount store operator Dollarama Inc  reported a 2% rise in quarterly profit on Thursday, boosted by higher comparable-store sales and opening of new stores.

The Montreal-based company's net income rose to C$143.2 million ($108.61 million), or 45 Canadian cents per share, in the second quarter ended Aug. 4, from C$140.4 million, or 42 Canadian cents, a year earlier.
Sales rose to C$946.4 million from C$868.5 million.
